trans-unit.source: CSS Language Features
trans-unit.target: CSS 語言功能

trans-unit.source: Provides rich language support for CSS, LESS and SCSS files.
trans-unit.target: 為 CSS, LESS 和 SCSS 檔案提供豐富的語言支援

trans-unit.source: CSS
trans-unit.target: CSS

trans-unit.source:
A list of relative file paths pointing to JSON files following the [custom data format](https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-css-languageservice/blob/master/docs/customData.md).
VS Code loads custom data on startup to enhance its CSS support for the custom CSS properties, at directives, pseudo classes and pseudo elements you specify in the JSON files.
The file paths are relative to workspace and only workspace folder settings are considered.
trans-unit.target:
指向 JSON 檔案的相對檔案路徑清單，遵循 [自訂資料格式](https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-css-languageservice/blob/master/docs/customData.md)。
VS Code 會在啟動時載入自訂資料，以增強您在 JSON 檔案中指定之自訂 CSS 屬性、at 指示詞虛擬類別和虛擬元素的 CSS 支援。
檔案路徑相對於工作區，而且僅會考慮工作區資料夾設定。

trans-unit.source: By default, VS Code triggers property value completion after selecting a CSS property. Use this setting to disable this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，VS Code 會在選取 CSS 屬性後，觸發屬性值完成。請使用此設定停用此行為。

trans-unit.source: Insert semicolon at end of line when completing CSS properties
trans-unit.target: 完成 CSS 屬性時在行尾插入分號

trans-unit.source: Invalid number of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 參數數目無效。

trans-unit.source: Do not use `width` or `height` when using `padding` or `border`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 'padding' 或 'border' 時不要使用 'width' 或 'height'。

trans-unit.source: When using a vendor-specific prefix make sure to also include all other vendor-specific properties.
trans-unit.target: 在使用廠商專屬的前置詞時，請確定也包括其他所有的廠商專屬屬性。

trans-unit.source: Do not use duplicate style definitions.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用重複的樣式定義。

trans-unit.source: Do not use empty rulesets.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用空白規則集。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using `float`. Floats lead to fragile CSS that is easy to break if one aspect of the layout changes.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用 'float'。浮動會使 CSS 脆弱，在版面配置的任一層面改變時容易中斷。

trans-unit.source: `@font-face` rule must define `src` and `font-family` properties.
trans-unit.target: `@font-face` 規則必須定義 `src` 和 `font-family` 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Hex colors must consist of three or six hex numbers.
trans-unit.target: 十六進位色彩必須由三個或六個十六進位數字組成。

trans-unit.source: Selectors should not contain IDs because these rules are too tightly coupled with the HTML.
trans-unit.target: 選取器不應包含 ID，因為這些規則與 HTML 結合過於緊密。

trans-unit.source: IE hacks are only necessary when supporting IE7 and older.
trans-unit.target: 只有在支援 IE7 及更舊的版本時才需要 IE Hack。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using `!important`. It is an indication that the specificity of the entire CSS has gotten out of control and needs to be refactored.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用 '!important'。這表示整個 CSS 的明確性皆失控，需要重構。

trans-unit.source: Import statements do not load in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 匯入陳述式不會平行載入。

trans-unit.source: Property is ignored due to the display. E.g. with `display: inline`, the `width`, `height`, `margin-top`, `margin-bottom`, and `float` properties have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 屬性因為顯示的關係而略過。例如，'display: inline' 會讓 'width'、'height'、'margin-top'、'margin-bottom' 及 'float' 屬性無效。

trans-unit.source: The universal selector (`*`) is known to be slow.
trans-unit.target: 已知通用選取器 (`*`) 速度緩慢。

trans-unit.source: Unknown at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 未知的 at-rule。

trans-unit.source: Unknown property.
trans-unit.target: 未知的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A list of properties that are not validated against the `unknownProperties` rule.
trans-unit.target: 未對 `unknownProperties` 規則驗證的屬性清單。

trans-unit.source: Unknown vendor specific property.
trans-unit.target: 未知的廠商特定屬性。

trans-unit.source: When using a vendor-specific prefix, also include the standard property.
trans-unit.target: 在使用廠商專屬的前置詞時，也包括標準屬性。

trans-unit.source: No unit for zero needed.
trans-unit.target: 零不需要任何單位。

trans-unit.source: Traces the communication between VS Code and the CSS language server.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤 VS Code 與 CSS 語言伺服器之間的通訊。

trans-unit.source: Controls CSS validation and problem severities.
trans-unit.target: 控制 CSS 驗證與問題嚴重性。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables all validations.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用所有驗證。

trans-unit.source: The setting `css.colorDecorators.enable` has been deprecated in favor of `editor.colorDecorators`.
trans-unit.target: 設定 `css.colorDecorators.enable` 已淘汰，改為 `editor.colorDecorators`。

trans-unit.source: The setting `scss.colorDecorators.enable` has been deprecated in favor of `editor.colorDecorators`.
trans-unit.target: 設定 `scss.colorDecorators.enable` 已淘汰，改為 `editor.colorDecorators`。

trans-unit.source: The setting `less.colorDecorators.enable` has been deprecated in favor of `editor.colorDecorators`.
trans-unit.target: 設定 `less.colorDecorators.enable` 已淘汰，改為 `editor.colorDecorators`。

trans-unit.source: CSS Language Server
trans-unit.target: CSS 語言伺服器

trans-unit.source: Folding Region Start
trans-unit.target: 摺疊區域開始

trans-unit.source: Folding Region End
trans-unit.target: 摺疊區域結束
